title: Can anyone help explain the "one-pass verification" process shows in WebAssembly design rational
body:
What is the meaning of "one-pass verification"? And why a stack based machine can simplify this process?

Also, I find the following sentence in the WebAssembly doc "Semantic->Validation" section:

A module binary must be validated before it is compiled.

I would like to know when the validation process will occur? During the process of "wat2wasm" or at any other stage? Thanks!
